mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOC_REVIEW ( HOSP_NO, ID, REVIEW_TREAT, REVIEW_SERVICE, REVIEW_FACIL, REVIEW_CONTENT, REGDATE, REGNO ) VALUES ( #{hospNo}, #{id}, #{reviewTreat}, #{reviewService}, #{reviewFacil}, #{reviewContent}, NOW(), #{regNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_NO AS reviewNo, HOSP_NO AS hospNo, ID AS id, REVIEW_TREAT AS reviewTreat, REVIEW_SERVICE AS reviewService, REVIEW_FACIL AS reviewFacil, REVIEW_CONTENT AS reviewContent, REGDATE AS regDate, REGNO AS regNo FROM DOC_REVIEW
